AI Description: ColabFold is a collaborative project that aims to bring together deep learning and biophysical modeling for protein structure prediction. It provides an easy-to-use interface for researchers to perform protein folding predictions using state-of-the-art techniques.
Core Features: Combines Deep Learning & Biophysical Modeling, Protein Structure Prediction, User-Friendly Interface
General Tags: Protein Structure Prediction, Deep Learning, Biophysical Modeling
